356e1472-987b-45f9-9cf1-8a75eb9d54bc.description: The earner of this badge has completed a 5 day hands on course combining both theory and practical assessments within a virtual lab. They have demonstrated skills assessed by experienced practicing penetration testers with a legacy of training at Black Hat. They know how to think and behave like an advanced hacker, identify commonly used vulnerabilities, how to deploy the latest and most common network infrastructure and cloud hacks and how to analyse their own organisations vulnerabilities.
356e1472-987b-45f9-9cf1-8a75eb9d54bc.name: Advanced Infrastructure Hacking

badge_template_activities.title: IT infrastructure is more complex and dynamic than it has ever been, demanding comprehensive, up-to-date, and well-rehearsed security skills to match. The hands-on, 5-day course will push your infrastructure hacking to the next level and widen your career prospects. Get your hands dirty with our popular virtual labs and learn from experienced, practicing penetration testers with a legacy of training at Black Hat.
